code: import React,{useState}from"react";import Card from'../Card/index';import"./Classe.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Classe=props=>{const[corAtual,setCorAtual]=useState(props.corSecundaria||"#ffffff");const[corPrimariaAtual,setCorPrimariaAtual]=useState(props.corPrimaria||"#000000");const atualizarCorSecundaria=novaCor=>{setCorAtual(novaCor);props.aoMudarCor(novaCor,props.id);};const atualizarCorPrimaria=novaCor=>{setCorPrimariaAtual(novaCor);props.aoMudarCorPrimaria(novaCor,props.id);};return props.aventureiros.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"Classe",style:{backgroundColor:corAtual},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inputs-cores",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:corAtual,type:"color",className:"input-color",onChange:e=>atualizarCorSecundaria(e.target.value),"aria-label":"Alterar cor secund\xE1ria"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:corPrimariaAtual,type:"color",className:"input-color2",onChange:e=>atualizarCorPrimaria(e.target.value),"aria-label":"Alterar cor prim\xE1ria"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{borderColor:corPrimariaAtual},children:props.nome}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"aventureiros",children:props.aventureiros.map(aventureiro=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{corDeFundo:corPrimariaAtual,nome:aventureiro.nome,especie:aventureiro.especie,imagem:aventureiro.imagem,favorito:aventureiro.favorito,aoDeletar:()=>props.aoDeletar(aventureiro.id),aoFavoritar:()=>props.aoFavoritar(aventureiro.id)},aventureiro.id))})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(React.Fragment,{});};export default Classe;
